name: Remix
description:
This NFT calls for disciplined fangaming across all continents. The main principles of fan gaming are the equal strength of the competing parties and the transfer of experience to the next generation of players around the world.

The NFT also calls for the proper formation of gaming communities so that today's gamers can show their grandchildren where and what their grandfather did, and perhaps play with them in fair online fan competitions in a pleasant atmosphere among people of all ages.

This token is fundamental and it is a tournament token, in order to get it you need to win a tournament, but in a limited amount you can collect five characters of tokens and in this way also take possession of a fundamental token.

The main thing is not to grow old in heart.

Best regards, Waxman!
